content: While revenue was impacted by macroeconomic pressure on the advertising rates, particularly in quarter three and quarter four, our continued focus on higher margin revenue diversification pushed 2022 gross profit to $63.5 million, up 68% from 2021. Direct sales were $12.8 million in Q4 versus $8.8 million in Q4 of last year, a 45% increase with the majority of direct sales being recognized in media and content. In aggregate, when excluding the NFL TNG investments, the company's recurring quarterly cash based OpEx was approximately $2 million lower in Q4 as compared to Q2 2022.
